headline: Show HN: Soliciting post placement on Hacker News
description:
Hey, HN -- I just received the following email and I'm not sure what to do about it. Obviously I want to discourage requested-posting like this; is there some structured way that we can do that? One of the things I love about HN is how high the signal-to-noise ratio is relative to...pretty much the rest of the internet.

I wouldn't ordinarily call someone out like this, but I want to innoculate HN against this sort of thing.

----

Hey doches,

Not sure if it's conventional, but thought I'd ask anyway.

Would you be open to posting about my product on Hacker News?

I understand that similar to Product Hunt, HN gives higher priority to users with higher karma. I usually keep up with recent discussions via RSS feed on Feedly, but almost neve post. So I thought I'd reach out to someone that has authority.

My product is called Popupular and it helps embed just about anything into a popup via a Google Chrome extension.

[rest of email truncated]
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: 在Hacker News上征集帖子的位置
headline_zh-Hant: Show HN: 在Hacker News上徵集帖子的位置
description_zh-Hans:
嘿，HN -- 我刚刚收到以下电子邮件，我不知道该如何处理它。显然，我想阻止像这样的请求贴；是否有一些结构化的方法，我们可以做到这一点？我喜欢HN的一个原因是，相对于......几乎互联网的其他地方，HN的信噪比很高。

我通常不会这样叫人，但我想让HN避免这种事情。

----

Hey doches,

不知道这是否常规，但我想还是要问一下。

你是否愿意在Hacker News上发布关于我的产品的信息？

我知道，与Product Hunt类似，HN对拥有较高业力的用户给予较高的优先权。我通常通过Feedly上的RSS订阅来了解最近的讨论，但几乎从不发帖。

我的产品叫Popupular，它可以通过谷歌浏览器的扩展功能将几乎所有的东西嵌入到弹出窗口中。

Hey doches,

不知道這是否常規，但我想還是要問一下。

我的產品叫Popupular，它可以通過谷歌瀏覽器的擴展功能將幾乎所有的東西嵌入到彈出窗口中。
